diff_hunk:
@@ -1460,51 +1460,65 @@ def _swap_axis(logits, dim_index, last_index, name=None):
   return output

body: You should use the @deprecated_args decorator to mark `dim` deprecated. I am in the process of making that decorator behave less noisy (warn only the first time), but it's already a good idea to use, so usage can adapt to the new names.
